species.name: tepig
descriptions: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.
It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.
